markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Narlynark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2177)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Narlynark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2177)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 106</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), primal focus ([_wand of spider climb_](/Spells.aspx?ID=299) made from a giant spider's foot)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Resistances**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 slashing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 22, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245)
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300)
- **2nd**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172)

**Wild Retreat** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Requirements** Narlynark is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** Narlynark shrieks in terror, a sound that quickly transitions from a kobold cry to the shrill cry of a bird. A pair of feathery wings grows from his back and his feet turn into bird talons. As he leaps into the air to flee, his talons lash out—one adjacent enemy of Narlynark's choice takes 3d6+6 slashing damage (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Narlynark can then fly up to 35 feet away. He must end his movement in a space that isn't adjacent to any enemies, and if he doesn't end the movement on the ground, he falls to the ground as his wings vanish and his feet return to normal.

</column>
name: Narlynark
